text: Mi iffe$ Ialut, s laaskeo, inna: "Oebbi, s tidep, a kwen Ijeooeb s wasif. Win iswan segs, ur illi yidi. Win ur neswi, neppa, s tidep, yidi. Kkes ed win iswan cwii, deg ufus is". Swan segs, siwa ixeiiayen segsen. Mi zegren, neppa akked wid iumnen yides, nnan: "ur nezmir assa, i Oalut akked laaskeo is". Nnan wid issarmen ar nitni ad mlilen d Oebbi: "aceal d abrid, iayfa tameeeyant te$leb iayfa tameqwoant, ma Irad Oebbi". Oebbi ar iueboiyen
